headline: 2024 a ‘quiet’ year for M&A in travel, hospitality sector
summary: Corporate deal volumes fell to their lowest levels since 2020, but hospitality companies continued to cross-pollinate through strategic partnerships and loyalty tie-ins, according to KPMG.
